data.text: We are excited to officially announce Cultural Agency. Cultural Agency, is a multicultural agency that connects publicity, awards and marketing campaigns to whatâ€™s happening in culture and is specifically focused on Latino, Black, API, LGBTQ+, faith and accessibility audiences. We are grateful to to be in Agency with our incredible Advisory Council: Sarah Kate Ellis President and CEO, GLAAD Dee Poku Spalding CEO and Founder The WIE Suite Nina Garcia Editor In Chief, ELLE Magazine Bing Chen CEO and Founder, Gold House Jessica Sibley CEO, TIME Thank you Angelique Jackson for an incredible write up with Variety Thank you Kyle O'Brien, Ryan Joe, and Will Lee for another incredible write up with ADWEEK VARIETY: https://lnkd.in/es7k5QJJ ADWEEK: https://lnkd.in/ei8G9cBa In Agency with Everyone.
